thread.title: Watch: Trail Blazers take positives away from preseason loss to Kings
thread.title_full: Watch: Trail Blazers take positives away from preseason loss to Kings | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Meagher | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Trail Blazers take positives away from preseason loss to Kings
text:
The Portland Trail Blazers dropped their preseason opener to the Sacramento Kings Monday night, 109-105 in overtime at the Moda Center.
While the final score sided with the Kings, the new-look Blazers found some positive signs from their first game together.
"Obviously you want to win games but I thought we took a lot of positives away," Portland coach Terry Stotts said after the game. "I liked our defense, particularly in the first half. We did a lot of good things offensively. We moved the ball really well and created opportunities. I thought the first half, it was really good basketball."
In the video above, Stotts, Damian Lillard and Meyers Leonard talk about the good and the bad for the Blazers in their preseason opener.
-- Sean Meagher | smeagher@oregonian.com
